channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1634; 07:36PM; 711 N Formosa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nnanwh; Fairfax; Structure fire call received at 7:17PM. Firefighters found a one story, single family dwelling with fire showing on the side of the building. After an aggressive offensive fire attack, 37 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. One dog was located in good condition and will be relinquished to LA Animal Services. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E61 E82 RA41 RA861 T27 T61; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1451; 05:56PM; 1549 E 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47NiJFD; Central-Alameda; KNOCKDOWN: First arriving task force extinguished a contents fire in one room of a (updated) one story duplex in six minutes. No injuries reported. This incident was initially called in as 'reported smoke' and upgraded to 'structure fire' when the fire company arrived on scene. No further details.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E209 E21 E210 E221 E46 SQ21 T10 T21 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Reported Smoke; INC#1451; 05:50PM; 1549 E 53rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/47NiJFD; Central-Alameda; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing in one room. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E209 E21 E210 E221 E46 SQ21 T10 T21 T9; CH7; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0695; 11:49AM; 17 Lax; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NmNwkt; Westchester; KNOCKDOWN: 38 firefighters extinguished the fire in 40 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended fully into the attic and required a closely coordinated interior fire attack with truck companies on the roof conducting vertical ventilation. LAWA reports there is no impact on airport traffic/safety. All occupants were out of the building prior to LAFD arrival. ; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E237 E263 E295 E43 E51 E62 RA59 RA867 T37 T63 T95; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0695; 11:09AM; 17 Lax; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NmNwkt; Westchester; One story bungalow (50' x 75') with smoke and fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode, located the fire and are starting to make progress.; FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E237 E263 E295 E43 E51 E62 RA59 RA867 T37 T63 T95; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Rubbish Fire; INC#0467; 09:14AM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GyOkPF; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fires in 40 minutes with no injuries reported. No structures were damaged.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E2 E209 E290 E4 E447 E458 E9 E90 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 T90; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Rubbish Fire; INC#0467; 08:34AM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GyOkPF; Boyle Heights; Preliminary reports of a palm tree fire which has evolved into three areas of light grass / brush burning in the vicinity of NB 5 Fwy x Soto St. There are no structures threatened and currently no wind. Additional resources requested due to the different locations. No injuries reported.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM22 E10 E2 E209 E290 E4 E447 E458 E9 E90 EM1 H3 HA3 RA25 T90; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0277; 05:28AM; 5015 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46KXDGI; South Park; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. While initially it appeared the fire extended to an adjacent one story commercial building, upon investigation it was found to be only residual smoke. No further details. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E203 E21 E211 E221 E226 E233 E264 E285 E33 E5 E57 E66 E9 E95 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA33 RA5 SQ21 SQ95 T11 T21 T26 T3 T33 T64 T85 UR5 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0277; 04:58AM; 5015 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46KXDGI; South Park; One story commercial building with heavy smoke showing with two buildings exposed (on either side) Additional resources enroute ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E203 E21 E211 E221 E226 E233 E264 E285 E33 E5 E57 E66 E9 E95 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA33 RA5 SQ21 SQ95 T11 T21 T26 T3 T33 T64 T85 UR5 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0133; 03:39AM; 1107 W 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RDz0Yo; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters battled for one hour and 34 minutes to extinguish a well involved, large two story craftsman style home with exposures on three sides. There are no injuries reported. Crews will remain onscene through the morning for overhaul operations. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E215 E226 E227 E233 E266 E3 E34 E46 E66 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA46 RA846 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T26 T27 T33 T66 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13 15; Margaret Stewart
